title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\SpeechRecognitionResult
name: SpeechRecognitionResult
description:
A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.SpeechRecognitionResult

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.alternatives
params.description: May contain one or more recognition hypotheses. These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

params.name: data.channel_tag
params.description: For multi-channel audio, this is the channel number corresponding to the recognized result for the audio from that channel. For audio_channel_count = N, its output values can range from 1 to N.

params.name: data.result_end_offset
params.description: Time offset of the end of this result relative to the beginning of the audio.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Output only. The BCP-47 language tag of the language in this result. This language code was detected to have the most likelihood of being spoken in the audio.
